title: What song has a long chorus sung by guys in a happy tone that ends with “oh oh oh”? I think it may be from the 80's. - Quora

response.answer_text: What song has a long chorus sung by guys in a happy tone that ends with “oh oh oh”? I think it may be from the 80’s. As stated, this question could be referring to any of a thousand different songs, so I’ll throw my hat in and hope for the best. When I read your question, the first song I thought of is ‘Magic’ by Scottish rock band Pilot. The ‘oh oh oh’ in this song is at the beginning rather than the end of the chorus, and was released in 1974 rather than the 80s, but otherwise if it’s not the song you’re looking for, you should listen to it anyway because it’s wonderful.
I think the song is “Dyer Maker” By Led Zep from the 70″s
